snippet: The Los Angeles Unified School District announced the move to parents after two teachers at Miramonte Elementary School were arrested last week on accusations of sexual abuse.
abstract: Los Angeles Unified School District announces that the entire faculty at Miramonte Elementary School will be replaced by new teachers after two teachers are arrested on accusations of child sexual abuse; drastic move is attempt to deal with crisis of confidence among parents who blame school officials for failing to act against the abuse.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Unified School District announced the move to parents after two teachers at Miramonte Elementary School were arrested last week on accusations of sexual abuse.

headline.seo: School Linked to Sex-Abuse Claims Will Replace Faculty
headline.main: School Linked to Abuse Claims Will Replace Entire Faculty
headline.print_headline: School Linked To Abuse Claims Will Replace All of Its Faculty
